SEARCH
Package oogasalad.editor.view

Interface EditorViewListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
EditorGameView, InputTabComponentFactory, PrefabPalettePane, PropertiesTabComponentFactory
public interface EditorViewListener
Interface for components that need to be notified about changes originating from the EditorController or the underlying model state. Follows the Observer pattern. (DESIGN-11, DESIGN-20)
Author:
Tatum McKinnis

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onDynamicVariablesChanged()
    Called when the list or content of dynamic variables changes.
    void
    onErrorOccurred(String errorMessage)
    Called when an error occurs during a controller action that the view should be aware of.
    void
    onObjectAdded(UUID objectId)
    Called when a new game object has been successfully added to the model.
    void
    onObjectRemoved(UUID objectId)
    Called when a game object has been successfully removed from the model.
    void
    onObjectUpdated(UUID objectId)
    Called when an existing game object's data (e.g., position, properties) has changed.
    void
    onPrefabsChanged()
    Called when prefabs are changed
    void
    onSelectionChanged(UUID selectedObjectId)
    Called when the currently selected object changes.

  • Method Details

    • onObjectAdded

      void onObjectAdded(UUID objectId)
      Called when a new game object has been successfully added to the model. The view should typically add a visual representation.
      Parameters:
      objectId - The ID of the newly added object.

    • onObjectRemoved

      void onObjectRemoved(UUID objectId)
      Called when a game object has been successfully removed from the model. The view should typically remove the visual representation.
      Parameters:
      objectId - The ID of the removed object.

    • onObjectUpdated

      void onObjectUpdated(UUID objectId)
      Called when an existing game object's data (e.g., position, properties) has changed. The view should typically update the visual representation.
      Parameters:
      objectId - The ID of the updated object.

    • onSelectionChanged

      void onSelectionChanged(UUID selectedObjectId)
      Called when the currently selected object changes. Views like property inspectors or input tabs should update accordingly.
      Parameters:
      selectedObjectId - The ID of the newly selected object, or null if none is selected.

    • onDynamicVariablesChanged

      void onDynamicVariablesChanged()
      Called when the list or content of dynamic variables changes. Views using dynamic variables (like the InputTab's parameter dropdown) should update.

    • onErrorOccurred

      void onErrorOccurred(String errorMessage)
      Called when an error occurs during a controller action that the view should be aware of.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - A message describing the error.

    • onPrefabsChanged

      void onPrefabsChanged()
      Called when prefabs are changed
